summary: The first-ever registered encounter by the Mumbai Police, which took place on November 1, 1982. Based on a true story.
cast: Anil Kapoor|John Abraham|Manoj Bajpayee|Tusshar Kapoor|Kangana Ranaut|Sonu Sood|Ronit Roy|Mahesh Manjrekar|Raju Mavani|Arif Zakaria|Pankaj Kalra|Karan Patel|Hussain Sheikh|Vineet Sharma|Raju Kher|Soni Razdan|Sandesh Jadhav|Chetan Hansraj|Feroz Abbasi|Sangeeta Khanayat|Randheer Rai|Alladin Khan|Shaji Chaudhary|Gargi Patel|Jaswinder Gardner|Tushar Jha|Shivraj Valwekar|Sanjeev Chadha|Siddhant Kapoor|Ranjeet|Akbar Khan|Sunny Leone|Sophiya Chaudhary|Yash Mehta|Priyanka Chopra|Jackie Shroff
title: Shootout at Wadala
